attributes.action: 75% of our laws are made in Brussels so we should only pay MPs 25% of their salary and pensions until they leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
We are currently paying our politicians to rubber stamp laws from Brussels.
MPs should accept to be paid pro rata as long as the EU is in control of making our laws.
All MPs should be paid 25% of their current salary and pensions. They don't make the laws that govern us but still expect to be paid as if they do.
